channel.title: Reinforcement Learning on Julien Vitay
channel.description: Recent content in Reinforcement Learning on Julien Vitay

item.title: Successor Representations
item.description: Successor representations (SR) attract a lot of attention these days, both in the neuroscientific and machine learning / deep RL communities. This post is intended to explain the main difference between SR and model-free / model-based RL algorithms and to point out its usefulness to understand goal-directed behavior.
